description: Twelve jurors deliberate the fate of a young man accused of murder, exposing prejudice, doubt, and the fragile nature of justice.
An office worker and a soap salesman form an underground fight club that evolves into a violent movement against consumer society.
A kind-hearted man with a low IQ unwittingly influences major historical events while searching for his lifelong love, Jenny.
A skilled thief who steals secrets through dream invasion must perform the impossible: planting an idea deep inside a target’s subconscious.
A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity as Earth faces extinction.
Set in coastal India, a tale of divine folklore and rebellion unfolds between man, nature, and ancestral deities.
A mythological drama depicting the divine incarnation of Lord Vishnu who emerges to destroy evil and restore cosmic balance.
A psychology professor’s life spirals out of control as he becomes entangled in a deadly mystery of deceit, obsession, and revenge.
Interwoven stories of Los Angeles criminals unfold in a blend of dark humor, violence, and pop-culture-infused dialogue.
A German businessman risks everything to save more than a thousand Jews from the Holocaust during World War II.
A group of mischievous high-school students turn every classroom into chaos while constantly outsmarting their teachers with humor and heart.
Batman faces his most dangerous nemesis yet, the Joker, whose reign of anarchy pushes Gotham City—and the hero himself—to their limits.
The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son in a world of loyalty, betrayal, and power.
The saga continues as Michael Corleone expands the family empire while flashbacks reveal the rise of young Vito Corleone.

primaryTitle: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
description: Three gunslingers compete to find a buried treasure during the chaos of the American Civil War.

primaryTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A young hobbit named Frodo inherits a powerful ring and embarks on a perilous quest to destroy it before it corrupts the world.

primaryTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: The final battle for Middle-earth begins as Frodo and Sam reach Mordor, and Aragorn rises to claim his destiny as king.

primaryTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
description: As the Fellowship is divided, Frodo and Sam continue toward Mordor while Aragorn, Legolas, and Gimli join forces to defend Rohan.
A banker wrongly imprisoned for murder forms an unlikely friendship and quietly plans his escape while inspiring hope among his fellow inmates.
Two feuding families in 19th-century Egypt use a servant’s false identity to gain favor with the governor, leading to hilarious chaos.
